org.oddjob.scheduling.state

Interface TimerStateConverter


  • public interface TimerStateConverter
    Provides a conversion from a State to an equivalent TimerState.

    Note that there is no parent state equivalent for State.isExecuting() because structural jobs should be TimerState.ACTIVE for this condition.

    Author:
    rob

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TimerState toStructuralState(State state)
      Convert a state to an equivalent parent state.

    • Method Detail

      • toStructuralState

        TimerState toStructuralState(State state)
        Convert a state to an equivalent parent state.
        Parameters:
        state - Any state.
        Returns:
        A Parent State.
